channel.title: Docker on MyTechKB
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on MyTechKB

item.title: Docker Commands
item.description: Create a Docker Swarm docker swarm init # Will give you join command which includes token and ip_address:port docker swarm join --token [token] [ip_address]:[port] # To get a join command for a worker docker swarm join-token worker # To get a join command for a manager docker swarm join-token manager # Check swarm with docker node ls
